info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 6:49PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MERCER...VENANGO... NORTH CENTRAL BUTLER AND WEST CENTRAL FOREST COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 649 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grove City, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Oil City, Grove City, Franklin, Sugarcreek, Tionesta, Hasson Heights, Stoneboro, Seneca, Polk, Sandy Lake, Rouseville, and Cooperstown. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 117 and 126. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 19 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
